Text: Very good but the girl reading the script has the worst pronunciation of Bogotรก and Medellin that I've ever heard. The FARC leader of the prison claims that they are self supporting. If you know anything about the FARC, the way they raise their money is by extortion, kidnapping, drug trafficking and murder.
Fuck America for making my country what it is today; corruption and violence. :( I hate saying that I'm from Colombia and have everyone make drug jokes, it's not even funny.
